document.full_text: the european union is under pressure to renegotiate its financial bailouts of ireland and greece after an irish minister said any concessions given to athens should mean better terms for dublin as well.
document.title: europe pressured to revise irish and greek bailouts
lines_and_colors: the european union is under pressure to renegotiate its financial bailouts of ireland and greece after an irish minister said any concessions given to athens should mean better terms for dublin as well.
